SELECT
employeeinfo.id, employeeinfo.name, employeeinfo.birthday, employeeinfo.kind, employeeinfo.trash, vehicleinfo.vehicle, vehicleinfo.bus
FROM employeeinfo
LEFT JOIN vehicleinfo
ON employeeinfo.id = vehicleinfo.id
OR employeeinfo.name Like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') OR vehicleinfo.vehicle Like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
GROUP BY employeeinfo.id
ORDER BY name;

SELECT
employeeinfo.*
FROM employeeinfo
ORDER BY name

SELECT
*
FROM
employeeinfo
LEFT JOIN
vehicleinfo
ON
employeeinfo.id = vehicleinfo.id
LEFT JOIN
regulardetail
ON
regulardetail.opercar = vehicleinfo.carnumber
LEFT JOIN
regular
ON
regular.conum = regulardetail.conum
WHERE employeeinfo.id = #{id}
ORDER BY name;

SELECT rsvt.rsvtseq, rsvt.desty, rsvt.stday, rsvt.endday, operation_info.operseq, operation_info.opernum, operation_info.rsvt, operation_info.operday, operation_info.operno, rsvt.numm, operation_info.atlm, operation_info.opertype, operation_info.operid, operation_info.opercar, IFNULL((SELECT vehicleinfo.vehicle FROM vehicleinfo WHERE vehicleinfo.carnumber = operation_info.opercar), operation_info.opercar) AS vehicle, (SELECT customer.ctmname FROM customer WHERE customer.ctmno = rsvt.ctmno) AS ctmname, operation_info.operconfirm, operation_info.opertrash
FROM
operation_info left join rsvt on operation_info.rsvt = rsvt.rsvt
WHERE
(operation_info.operday BETWEEN #{stday} AND #{endday})
AND
operation_info.operid = #{operid}
AND
operation_info.dayst = 1
ORDER BY rsvt.stday, operation_info.opernum, operation_info.operday, rsvt.stt;

SELECT
operation_info.opernum, COUNT(*) AS cnt
FROM
operation_info left join rsvt on operation_info.rsvt = rsvt.rsvt
WHERE
operation_info.opernum IN (SELECT
operation_info.opernum
FROM
operation_info
WHERE
(operation_info.operday BETWEEN #{stday} AND #{endday})
AND
operation_info.operid = #{operid}
GROUP BY operation_info.opernum)
AND
operation_info.operid = #{operid}
GROUP BY operation_info.opernum
ORDER BY rsvt.stday, operation_info.opernum, operation_info.operday, rsvt.stt;

SELECT
CONCAT(YEAR(operation_info.operday), '-', MONTH(operation_info.operday)) AS ctmaddress,
SUM(operation_info.atlm) AS ctmtrash,
SUM(rsvt.numm) AS opertype,
COUNT(operation_info.operseq) AS conm
FROM
operation_info
LEFT JOIN
rsvt
ON
operation_info.rsvt = rsvt.rsvt
WHERE
operation_info.dayst = 1
AND
operation_info.operid = #{id}
GROUP BY ctmaddress
ORDER BY YEAR(operation_info.operday) DESC, MONTH(operation_info.operday) DESC

SELECT
*
FROM
operation_info
LEFT JOIN
rsvt
ON
operation_info.rsvt = rsvt.rsvt
LEFT JOIN
customer
ON
rsvt.ctmno = customer.ctmno
WHERE
operation_info.dayst = 1
AND
operation_info.operid = #{id}
ORDER BY operation_info.operday DESC;
